Object.Name: hvac.capacity
Object.Description1: This Resource describes the capacity (heating or cooling) of a HVAC system. "capacity" is a number in units of kW (kilowatts). To convert from kW to other units that may be commonly used in certain geographic locales the following conversions should be applied: - to convert to BTU/hr: BTU/hr = 3412. 142 * kW - to convert to ton: ton = kW/3. 5168525

Item.Name: capacity
Item.Description: The rated capacity for the Device.
